## CIvic pass

### Identity and Access Management (IAM) for Distributed Ledger Technology
(DLT).

Enhance security. Improve efficiency. Embrace interoperability.

### Civic Pass at a glance

Industry-leading identity tools for smart contracts, dApps, and more.

  * Allow the traffic you want, and keep out the rest
  * Strengthen your compliance program
  * Configure verifications for your business

### Adapted to a multi-chain, multi-wallet world

On Ethereum, Solana, Polygon, Polygon zkEVM, Arbitrum, XDC, and Fantom.

Connect with Metamask, Phantom, Ledger, or your wallet of choice.

Learn More

### Establish trust with  
Civic Proof of Personhood

Maintain a high degree of certainty that the wallet is not associated with an
AI agent or bot.

  * ##### Uniqueness

A unique human behind every wallet

  * ##### Continuity

The same human behind the same wallet

  * ##### Distinguish real from AI

Reveal whether the content your audience is consuming is real or AI-generated.

  * ##### Build a stronger community

Confirm the humanity of members while offering protection against Sybil
attacks.

  * ##### Help block bad actors

Safeguard your platform from disruptive or harmful elements.

### Civic Pass for Sybil & AI Resistance

For businesses that need to keep bad actors at bay or to distinguish between
humans and bots in the digital realm.

  * ##### Access control

Align access privileges with an employee or entity’s appropriate security
clearance level.

  * ##### Gaming platforms

Ensure players are real people and of an allowed age to play.

  * ##### NFT mints

Ask for video proof of liveness and/or check for one unique user per wallet.

  * ##### Online communities

Help prevent Sybil attacks and voting fraud in your DAO or virtual space.

Civic Docs

### Civic Pass for Compliance

For businesses with well-defined regulatory requirements.  
Help meet global and local regulations with Civic’s ID and Age Verification
solutions.

  * ##### CeFi & DeFi compliance

In light of impending global regulations including MiCA and TFR, Know Your
Customer (KYC) practices will become mandatory for VASPs.

  * ##### Real-world assets (RWAs)

Ensure the legitimate participation of individuals and businesses in the
tokenized physical assets market.

  * ##### Gambling platforms

Check your users for both age and location in accordance with local
requirements.

Learn More

### Trusted by

### Prepare for emerging challenges

  * The **Transfer of Funds Regulation (TFR) and Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA) Regulation** is set to transform the IAM and DLT landscape. Learn more.
  * Understand how the **Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA)** may impact your business. Learn more.
  * As new **AI threats emerge** , control who is allowed to use your services by checking for liveness or tagging AI-generated content. Learn more.

### Industry-leading security

Keeping your information safe is our top priority. To do this, we leverage
advanced strategies, including blockchain, encryption, and strong data
protection policies.

##### Standards compliant

##### Hacken audited

##### GDPR compliant

##### Strategic partner

### Building blocks for growth

All the tools needed to get started fast. Scale up or down as business demands
change, and take full control of your account with our self-management tools.

### Civic Passes

Use Civic’s identity verification services or use your own. Or use both.

Tailor any combination of available verifications to serve as inputs to your
compliance program.

SEE PRICING

### The Dashboard

Make informed decisions about your business with real-time data.

  * A snapshot of Civic Pass metrics and pass activity
  * ️Issue, freeze, or revoke Civic Passes
  * Manage dashboard users

### For developers

Keep your dApp, protocol, or community safe from bad actors with Civic Pass.
It’s multi-chain, non-transferrable, revocable, and privacy-first.

Get started for free.

CIVIC DOCS

### See for yourself

See how Civic Pass verifications work. Get an on-chain Civic Pass for your
wallet on your blockchain of choice. More chains coming soon.

GET A PASS

## Civic Passes

Price per issuance (excludes blockchain fees)

Pricing in USD and subject to cryptocurrency fluctuations; actual amounts
presented at time of transaction.

CAPTCHA

$0.05

Determines human or bot

Liveness

$0.15

Video selfie to determine human or bot

Uniqueness

$0.30

Video selfie to determine 1-user-1-wallet

Age Check

$0.30

Enables 13+, 18+, or 21+ age threshold check​

Age Verification

$1.99

Checks against government-issued ID document​

ID Verification

$1.99

Government-issued ID document verification, liveness, facial comparison to
document, DOB, email, IP check for excluded or OFAC-sanctioned countries

## FAQ

What’s the difference between a Civic vs. Custom pass?

With a  **Civic Pass** , Civic provides the identity verification services
referenced in the price list above.

With a  **Custom Pass** , you may use your own identity verification service
provider, use Civic’s, or a combination of both.

I'm not sure which plan I need for my project. Can I speak with someone?

We’re happy to help. Please get in touch with our team.

Can I upgrade/downgrade my plan?

Sure. Please get in touch with our team.

What's the difference between User Pays vs. You Pay?

If **User Pays** , your users will pay for Civic Pass fees plus actual
blockchain costs.

If **You Pay** , you will pay for Civic Pass fees plus actual blockchain
costs.

What is Flex-Pay?

Flex-Pay, available for Business and Custom tiers, provides you with the
option of:

  1.  **You pay** for your users’ Civic Pass fees and blockchain costs _or_
  2.  **Your users pay** for their Civic Pass fees and blockchain costs

 **You Pay**  is ideal for reducing user friction during onboarding.  **User
Pay**  is ideal for keeping your costs consistent and predictable.

How will I pay for services?

A credit card is required at signup for paid plans. We accept credit cards,
Apple Pay, and Google Pay in USD.

How does billing work?

Each month, you will be billed for the platform fee along with any blockchain
and identity verification service fees from the previous month.

How do you keep data safe?

We leverage advanced strategies, including blockchain, encryption, and strong
data protection policies to keep data safe. Please review our Legal
Disclosures.
